name: Refactor authentication module
description: Our authentication module has grown to 2000 lines, test coverage is 40%, but it's been stable in production for 18 months. Code is becoming harder to maintain. Should we refactor it now, schedule it for later, or leave it alone?
options: Refactor now - dedicate 2-3 weeks to rewrite with better structure
Refactor later - schedule for next quarter when team has capacity
Leave as-is - it works, focus on new features instead
constraints: New features are also high priority
